Interface UsageModelXMLBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UsageModelXMLBuilderImpl

    public interface UsageModelXMLBuilder
    The Interface UsageModelXMLBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • addClosedWorkload

        Element addClosedWorkload(Element usageScenario,
                          int population,
                          double thinkTime)
        Adds an Open Workload to the Usage Model.
        Parameters:
        usageScenario - is the scenario to which has to be associated the workload.
        population - is the population of the closed workload.
        thinkTime - is the think time related to the closed workload.
        Returns:
        the Element representing the generated workload if the operation succeeds, null otherwise.

      • addOpenWorkload

        Element addOpenWorkload(Element usageScenario,
                        double interarrivalTime)
        Adds an Open Workload to the Usage Model.
        Parameters:
        usageScenario - is the scenario to which has to be associated the workload.
        interarrivalTime - is the interarrival time of the requests.
        Returns:
        the Element representing the generated workload if the operation succeeds, null otherwise.

      • changeSystemAndRepositoryModelsPath

        void changeSystemAndRepositoryModelsPath(String newPath)
        Change the href attribute referencing the System and Repository Models.
        Parameters:
        newPath - is the String representing the new path to set.

      • getUsageScenarios

        List<Element> getUsageScenarios()
        Retrieves the list of all the usage scenarios within the Usage Model.
        Returns:
        a list of Element representing usage scenarios.

      • loadModel

        boolean loadModel(File model)
        Loads an existent Usage Model.
        Parameters:
        model - is the file containing the XML representation of the model.
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeds, false otherwise.

      • serializeModel

        File serializeModel()
        Serialize the model in the XML format.
        Returns:
        the file containing the XML version of the model.

      • serializeModel

        File serializeModel(File outFile)
        Serialize the model in the XML format in the specified output file.
        Parameters:
        outFile - is the output file.
        Returns:
        the generated file if the operation succeeds, null otherwise.
